BIOGRAPHY

Hi, I am a recent college graduate with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (2019). I have strong programming experience in several back-end languages as well as some experience in front-end web development. I am currently looking for an entry-level Front End Developer position in the Greater Seattle/Tacoma area. Feel free to check out some of my projects!
